title: Consider Audience Interaction
text: Engaging an audience often involves making them part of the presentation.

title: Think About Presentation Style
text: A monotone voice can make a presentation less engaging.

title: Evaluate the Use of Slides
text: Reading directly from slides can make the presentation less dynamic.

hintAnswer: Incorporate interactive elements like polls or Q&A sessions.
title: Identify Interactive Elements
text: Incorporating interactive elements like polls or Q&A sessions can increase audience engagement.
choices: Incorporate interactive elements like polls or Q&A sessions.
Use a monotone voice throughout the presentation.
